name: Brackey6
description:
Humanity has discovered a planet that has a "living" race track. The entity changes track configuration every cycle. Can you dominate the track and your opponents?

Protoype: 

  • 1 Map only -> Controls: W A D
  • Chaos Portals: Transport you 100 meters in any direction
  • Electro-Turrets: Slows down the first person to enter

Future (Potential): 

  • Selectable Drones & Skins
  • Drone abilities
  • Procedural Maps
  • Networking
  • Achievements
